body_html:
@Flock1 do not install caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7-gcc4.8 . It does not come with it's own gcc; it is built specifically for gcc < 5. Your gcc is 5.04 so it will break for sure. It also might install conda packages specifically built for gcc < 5 which will corrupt your conda environment and break lots of things.

What is your error message now?
